item.title: About me
item.description: Personal My name is Hamid Moazzami (/hæmɪd/ - he/him). I was born on October 1992. I am married and have no kids. Professional The beginning I am a passionate mobile app developer who like sot create amazing stuff. My mobile development career started when I was experimenting if I can make an Android app to propose to my now wife (She said yes!). My first year started getting to know Android platform and basic tools to create Android apps.
